Detailed Description

Abstraction for rendering. Handles rendering of everything.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum _ObjectZ

Struct that describes an renderable objects Z-position relative to the others. This is to control what objects that should be rendered in front of what.

Member Function Documentation

void beginRender ( ObjectZ  zposition,
Texture *  texture 
)

Start rendering.

Parameters:
zposition The z-position to render the object in. Must be one of the constants defined in the enum ObjectZ.
texture Pointer to a texture to use for rendering. Pass a null-pointer for no texture.

void addVertex ( double  x,
double  y,
double  texX,
double  texY 
)

Parameters:
x x-position of the vertex to be drawn.
y y-position of the vertex to be drawn.
texX The texture's x-coordinate for this vertex.
\note Vertices must be added in multiples of 4. Failure to do this will result in an exception being thrown.

Member Data Documentation

enum Engine::Renderer::_ObjectZ ObjectZ

Struct that describes an renderable objects Z-position relative to the others. This is to control what objects that should be rendered in front of what.
